name: TRACK FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Track is a path or way and foundation stands for establishment or success so track foundation is a path to success. Track foundation reaches out to help many needy children and their families and guides them on the right track by providing them proper education and vocational training so that they can earn their own livelihood.Our organisation believes in transparency and accuracy to curb the social evils like human trafficking, child labour etc, which is a part of our society, it is an institution which is based upon voluntary services associated by a group of social activists. The society has been registered under the WEST BENGAL CHARITABLE TRUST ACT1962, we are also registered with NITI AAYOG (PLANNING COMMISSION OF INDIA)
